data.name: CpuLoadCheck_CpuLoadCheckReason
data.comment: Reason for suspending standby due to CPU load; {0} = Target CPU load; actual CPU load

data.name: NetworkLoadCheck_CombinedNetworkLoadReason
data.value: Netzwerkauslastung (Upload + Download) [{0}] größer als {1} KBit/s ({2} KBit/s)
data.comment: Reason for suspending standby due to combined network activity; {0} = NIC name; {1} = target network load (upload + download) in KBit/s; {2} = actual combined network load

data.name: NetworkLoadCheck_DownloadNetworkLoadReason
data.comment: Reason for suspending standby due to download network activity; {0} = NIC name; {1} = Network load (download) in KBit/s; {2} = actual download network load

data.name: NetworkLoadCheck_UploadNetworkLoadReason
data.comment: Reason for suspending standby due to upload network activity; {0} = NIC name; {1} = Network load (upload) in KBit/s {2} = actual upload network load

data.name: NetworkManager_ResetNetworkConnections
data.comment: Log: Message when network connections are reset

data.name: NetworkManager_ResetNetworkInterface
data.comment: Log (verbose): Message when a network connection was reset; {0}=Name of NIC

data.name: NetworkManager_ResetNetworkInterfaceFailed
data.comment: Log (error): Message when resetting a network connection fails; [0}=Name of NIC

data.name: NetworkManager_ResetNetworkInterfaceGeneralError
data.comment: Log (error): Message when a general error occurs while resetting network connections (e.g. network connection cannot be obtained)

data.name: NetworkResourcesCheck_NetworkResourcesCheckReason
data.comment: Reason for suspending standby due to file access over network; {0} = path of the resource opened over network

data.name: PingCheck_MachineOnlineReason
data.comment: Reason for suspending standby due to network machines; {0} = Machine name or IP address

data.name: ProcessCheck_ProcessFoundReason
data.comment: Reason for suspending standby due to running processes; {0} = Process name

data.name: SettingsManager_DeleteSettingsError
data.comment: Error message when deleting settings fails

data.name: SettingsManager_LoadSettingsError
data.comment: Error message when loading settings fails

data.name: SettingsManager_SaveSettingsError
data.comment: Error message when saving settings fails

data.name: StandbyManager_CreatePowerRequestFail

data.comment: Error message when creating power request fails

data.name: StandbyManager_PowerAvailabilityRequestsNotSupported

data.comment: Log (verbose): Message when power availability requests not supported by OS

data.name: StandbyManager_PowerAvailabilityRequestsSupported
data.value: Power Availability Requests werden vom Betriebssystem unterstützt
data.comment: Log (verbose): Message when power availability requests supported by OS

data.name: StandbyManager_ResetWindowsIdleTimer
data.comment: Log (verbose): Message when windows idle timer gets reset

data.name: StandbyManager_ResetWindowsIdleTimerFailed
data.value: Fehler beim Zurückssetzen des Windows Idle-Timers
data.comment: Log: Message when reset of windows idle timer fails

data.name: StandbyManager_StandbyEnabled
data.comment: Log: Message when standby mode gets enabled after is was supressed

data.name: StandbyManager_StandbyEnableFailed
data.value: Fehler beim Aufheben der Unterdrückung des Standby-Modus
data.comment: Log: Error message when enabling standby mode fails

data.name: StandbyManager_StandbySuspended

data.name: StandbyManager_StandbySuspendedWithoutReason
data.comment: Log: Message when standby gets suspended

data.name: StandbyManager_StandbySuspendedWithReason
data.comment: Log: Message when standby gets suspended; {0} =Reason

data.name: StandbyManager_SuspendStandbyFailed
data.comment: Log: Error message when suspending standby mode fails

data.comment: Log: Message when wake timer is cancelled

data.comment: Log (verbose): Message when the monitoring timer gets stopped

data.comment: Log: Message when service is stopped

data.comment: Log: Message when system enters standby mode

data.name: WsapmManager_ValidationErrorCheckInterval
data.value: Die Windows-Standby-Zeit ({0} Minuten) ist größer als das eingestellte Überprüfungs-Interval ({1} Minuten)
data.comment: Log: Warning if the Windows idle timeout is greater than the check interval; {0} = Windows idle timout (minutes); {1} = Check interval (minutes)

data.name: WsapmManager_ValidationErrorWakeTimers
data.value: Die Option 'Zeitgeber zur Aktivierung zulassen' ist in den Windows-Energieoptionen deaktiviert
data.comment: Log: Warning if the option 'Allow wake timers' is disabled in the Windows power options

data.name: WsapmManager_WakeTimerCompleted
data.comment: Log (verbose): Message when wake timer completed

data.name: SettingsManager_ImportSettingsError
data.comment: Exception message if the imported file is no valid WSAPM settings file

data.name: WsapmManager_UpdateAvailable
data.value: Update verfügbar ({0}). Klicken Sie auf 'Nach Updates suchen' um das Update durchzuführen
data.comment: Log: Message when there is an update available for WSAPM; {0} = latest version

data.name: WsapmManager_ResetNetworkConnectionsAfterWake
data.comment: Log: Message when the active network connections are reset

data.comment: Log (verbose): Message when a service gets restarted

data.name: ServiceManager_RestartServiceFailed
data.comment: Log: Message when restarting of a service fails; {0} = service name

data.comment: Log: Message when windows services are restarted

data.comment: Log (verbose): Message when program gets started; {0} = name of the program

data.name: WsapmManager_StartProgramsAfterEveryWake
data.comment: Log: Message when programs are started after every wake

data.name: WsapmManager_StartProgramsAfterWake
data.comment: Log: Message when programs are started after wake

data.name: WakeScheduler_WakeSchedulerExpired
data.comment: Next due time for expired WakeTimers

data.name: ActionAfterPolicyCheck_ActionModeAtLeastOnePolicySatisfied
data.comment: Action mode of after policy check action when at least one policy has to be satisfied

data.comment: Action mode of after policy check action when no policy is satisfied

data.name: ActionAfterPolicyCheck_ActionNameHibernate
data.comment: Action name ('hibernate') after checking policies

data.comment: Action name ('shut down') after checking policies

data.name: ActionAfterPolicyCheck_ActionNameStandby
data.comment: Action name ('standby') after checking policies

data.name: ActionAfterPolicyCheck_ActionNameStartProgram
data.comment: Action name ('start program') after checking policies

data.name: ActionAfterPolicyCheckManager_ExecutingAction
data.value: Führe benutzerdefinierte Aktion nach der Überprüfung aus ({0})
data.comment: Log: Message when a user defined action is executed; {0} = the action to be executed

data.name: WsapmManager_ExecuteActionWhenAtLeastOnePolicySatisfied
data.value: Führe benutzerdefinierte Aktionen nach der Überprüfung aus (mindestens eine Richtlinie erfüllt)
data.comment: Log (verbose): Message when executing action when at least one policy is satisfied

data.name: WsapmManager_ExecuteActionWhenNoPolicySatisfied
data.value: Führe benutzerdefinierte Aktionen nach der Überprüfung aus (keine Richtlinie erfüllt)
data.comment: Log (verbose): Message when executing action when no policy satisfied

data.comment: Log: Message when system is restarted from remote command

data.comment: Log: Message when system is shut down from remote command

data.comment: Log: Message when system enters standby mode from remote command

data.comment: Log (verbose): Message when ShutdownManager was started and is listening

data.name: ShutdownManager_StopListening

data.comment: Log (verbose): Message when ShutdownManager was stopped and is not listening for remote commands

data.name: ShutdownManager_WarningWrongPassword
data.value: Remote-Shutdown-Befehl empfangen, aber mit falschem Passwort
data.comment: Log: Warning if a valid remmote shut down command was received, but with wring password

data.comment: Error message when saving temporary uptime file fails
